dt: {bc}to pass the summer in a state of torpor or dormancy

dt.t: Snails combat desiccation by {wi}estivating{/wi}, that is, burrowing into the mud and sealing up the shell with mucus until conditions improve.

dt: {bc}to spend the summer usually at one place

dt.t: … I asked him to Skype in from the Connecticut coastline, where he is {wi}estivating{/wi} while on a prestigious writing fellowship …

shortdef: to pass the summer in a state of torpor or dormancy
to spend the summer usually at one place
